hotel.name: M Hotel Al Dana Makkah by Millennium

rateBasis.tariffNotes:
Rate Notes:
Hotel Tariff Notes: NOTE: Breakfast is Fixed Menu, Room Service, Not buffet No show and early departure will be subjected to 100% charge. No date, name and room change allowed. Bookings including children will be based on sharing parents bedding, no separate bed for children is provided unless other stated. Prices include 5% VAT, and municipality fees calculated as follows: 5% VAT for 4 – 5 star Hotels, 2.5% VAT for 3 star and below.

Cancellation policy is based on local time of destination.Bookings including children will be based on sharing parents bedding and no separate bed for children is provided unless otherwise statedIf you book Twin Bedding type - requests are not guaranteed and will be honored depending on availability upon guest arrival to the hotel.No-shows/Early check-outs will incur 100% charge unless otherwise stated. Prices include 5% VAT, and municipality fees calculated as follows: 5% VAT for 4 – 5 star Hotels, 2.5% VAT for 3 star and below.
